name: Giełda Papierów Wartościowych w Warszawie S.A.
membership: GPW is a member of FESE
goal: WSE was created as a joint-stock company on April 12, 1991 by the State Treasury pursuant to the Foundation Act for Giełda Papierów Wartościowych w Warszawie SA (The Warsaw Stock Exchange Company). Our mission is to develop effective mechanisms of capital and commodity flows by providing exchange and clearing services which are competitive in terms of quality and price and address the needs and expectations of our clients: companies, investors, and brokers.
interests: Banking and financial services, Economy, finance and the euro, Fraud prevention, Single market, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Giełda Papierów Wartościowych w Warszawie S.A. follows all European Commission activities and legislative files pertaining to the establishment of Capital Markets Union. Furthermore, GPW is involved in: the implementation of Directive 2014/65 (MiFID II) and Regulation 600/2014 (MiFIR); the implementation of Directive 2003/6/EC (MAD) and Regulation (EU) No 596/2014 (MAR) and all other consultation papers pertaining to regulation of financial instruments.
